name: Mano Italiano
description: I am Italian and I have a tendency to talk with my hands. A lot. And because of this, I have knocked over my fair share of glassware and liquids that get in the way of my physical talking. No discussion ends dry, shatter-less or unstained. "Mano Italiano" is an interactive game created with Unity and Leap Motion, where the player can talk and see just how destructive their hand gestures can be.
